Citation: Zomer, R. J., Xu, J., & Trabucco, A. (2022). Version 3 of the global aridity index and potential evapotranspiration database. Scientific Data, 9(1), 409.

Name: Global Ecosystem Dynamics Investigation (GEDI)
Variable: Canopy height (L3), Above ground biomass density (L4)
Citation: Dubayah, R.O., S.B. Luthcke, T.J. Sabaka, J.B. Nicholas, S. Preaux, and M.A. Hofton. 2021. GEDI L3 Gridded Land Surface Metrics, Version 2. ORNL DAAC, Oak Ridge, Tennessee, USA. Distributed by OpenTopography. https://doi.org/10.3334/ORNLDAAC/1952.
Comment: Limited to -52 and 52 degrees latitude. Also available in https://portal.opentopography.org/datasetMetadata?otCollectionID=OT.032022.4326.1

Name: GLEAM4
Citation: Miralles, D. G., Bonte, O., Koppa, A., Baez-Villanueva, O. M., Tronquo, E., Zhong, F., ... & Haghdoost, S. (2025). GLEAM4: global land evaporation and soil moisture dataset at 0.1 resolution from 1980 to near present. Scientific data, 12(1), 416
Comment: estimate the different components of terrestrial evaporation (i.e. 'evapotranspiration') based on satellite observations: transpiration (Et), interception loss (Ei), bare-soil evaporation (Eb), snow sublimation (Es) and open-water evaporation (Ew). Intermediate outputs of the model include potential evaporation (Ep), root-zone soil moisture(SMrz), surface soil moisture (SMs), evaporative stress (S), and surface sensible heat flux (H)

Name: MODIS Primary productivity
Citation: Running, S., & Zhao, M. (2021). MODIS/Terra Net Primary Production Gap-Filled Yearly L4 Global 500m SIN Grid V061. NASA Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center

Name: High-Resolution Vegetation
Citation: NA
Comment: Various dataset: Leaf Area index, Burnt area, Phenology, Primary production

Name: MODIS Vegetation Index MOD13Q1
Citation: Didan, K. (2021). MODIS/Terra Vegetation Indices 16-Day L3 Global 250m SIN Grid V061. NASA Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center.
